intro: Schlegelia fastigiata, commonly known as the upright schlegelia, is a species of flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its compact, upright growth habit and produces small, star-shaped flowers in shades of pink and white. Its foliage is typically succulent, with thick, fleshy leaves that help it retain moisture in arid environments. Schlegelia fastigiata is often cultivated in rock gardens and as a decorative plant due to its attractive appearance and low maintenance requirements.
